name: http://www.relaxofficefurniture.co.uk/
short_description: Relax Office Furniture was established January 2008.Our main focus is to offer quality office furniture and office chairs with a fast and friendly service.  We pride ourselves in excellent customer service and make every effort to help and advise our customers with their requirements.  We aim to minimise delivery times and if unexpected delivery delays occur, we will do our best to keep the customer informed every step of the way.  We want our customers to be very satisfied both with our service and their purchase and therefore we are confident our customers will return to us for future purchases.
summary: Quality office furniture at discount prices including office desk
